summary: Encapsulates a Philips Hue light entity, providing asynchronous control (turn on/off, update) and exposing its state and attributes such as brightness, color temperature, hue‑saturation color, effect list, availability, name and unique identifier.
business_intent: Enable integration of Hue lighting into smart‑home platforms, allowing users and automation routines to manage lighting parameters and monitor device status for seamless home automation.
